fmiModelDescription.cmt_numberOfRealAlgebraicVariables: NY: number of real variables, OMC
fmiModelDescription.cmt_numberOfRealAlgebraicAliasVariables: NA: number of alias variables, OMC
fmiModelDescription.cmt_numberOfIntegerAlgebraicVariables: NYINT: number of alg. int variables, OMC
fmiModelDescription.cmt_numberOfIntegerAliasVariables: NAINT: number of alias int variables, OMC
fmiModelDescription.cmt_numberOfStringAlgebraicVariables: NYSTR: number of alg. string variables, OMC
fmiModelDescription.cmt_numberOfStringAliasVariables: NASTR: number of alias string variables, OMC
fmiModelDescription.cmt_numberOfBooleanAlgebraicVariables: NYBOOL: number of alg. bool variables, OMC
fmiModelDescription.cmt_numberOfBooleanAliasVariables: NABOOL: number of alias bool variables, OMC

ScalarVariable.name: sin.T_in_internal
ScalarVariable.description: Needed to connect to conditional connector

ScalarVariable.name: sin.X_in_internal[1]
ScalarVariable.description: Needed to connect to conditional connector

ScalarVariable.name: sin.p_in_internal
ScalarVariable.description: Needed to connect to conditional connector

ScalarVariable.name: sin.ports[1].h_outflow
ScalarVariable.description: Specific thermodynamic enthalpy close to the connection point if m_flow < 0

ScalarVariable.name: sou.T_in_internal
ScalarVariable.description: Needed to connect to conditional connector

ScalarVariable.name: sou.X_in_internal[1]
ScalarVariable.description: Needed to connect to conditional connector

ScalarVariable.name: sou.p_in_internal
ScalarVariable.description: Needed to connect to conditional connector

ScalarVariable.name: sou.ports[1].h_outflow
ScalarVariable.description: Specific thermodynamic enthalpy close to the connection point if m_flow < 0

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.dp
ScalarVariable.description: Pressure difference between port_a and port_b

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.k
ScalarVariable.description: Flow coefficient of valve and pipe in series, k=m_flow/sqrt(dp), with unit=(kg.m)^(1/2).

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.m_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Mass flow rate from port_a to port_b (m_flow > 0 is design flow direction)

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.phi
ScalarVariable.description: Ratio actual to nominal mass flow rate of valve, phi=Kv(y)/Kv(y=1)

ScalarVariable.name: y.y
ScalarVariable.description: Connector of Real output signal

ScalarVariable.name: sin.T
ScalarVariable.description: Fixed value of temperature

ScalarVariable.name: sin.X[1]
ScalarVariable.description: Fixed value of composition

ScalarVariable.name: sin.p
ScalarVariable.description: Fixed value of pressure

ScalarVariable.name: sou.T
ScalarVariable.description: Fixed value of temperature

ScalarVariable.name: sou.X[1]
ScalarVariable.description: Fixed value of composition

ScalarVariable.name: sou.p
ScalarVariable.description: Fixed value of pressure

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.Av
ScalarVariable.description: Av (metric) flow coefficient

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.Cv
ScalarVariable.description: Cv (US) flow coefficient [USG/min/(psi)^(1/2)]

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.Kv
ScalarVariable.description: Kv (metric) flow coefficient [m3/h/(bar)^(1/2)]

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.Kv_SI
ScalarVariable.description: Flow coefficient for fully open valve in SI units, Kv=m_flow/sqrt(dp) [kg/s/(Pa)^(1/2)]

ScalarVariable.name: valLin._dp_start
ScalarVariable.description: Start value for dp, used to avoid a warning if not set in dp, and to avoid dp.start in parameter window

ScalarVariable.name: valLin._m_flow_start
ScalarVariable.description: Start value for m_flow, used to avoid a warning if not set in m_flow, and to avoid m_flow.start in parameter window

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.deltaM
ScalarVariable.description: Fraction of nominal flow rate where linearization starts, if y=1

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.dpFixed_nominal
ScalarVariable.description: Pressure drop of pipe and other resistances that are in series

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.dpValve_nominal
ScalarVariable.description: Nominal pressure drop of fully open valve, used if CvData=Buildings.Fluid.Types.CvTypes.OpPoint

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.dp_nominal
ScalarVariable.description: Pressure drop at nominal mass flow rate

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.dp_nominal_pos
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute value of nominal pressure difference

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.eta_default
ScalarVariable.description: Dynamic viscosity, used to compute transition to turbulent flow regime

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.fCut
ScalarVariable.description: Cut-off frequency of filter

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.kFixed
ScalarVariable.description: Flow coefficient of fixed resistance that may be in series with valve, k=m_flow/sqrt(dp), with unit=(kg.m)^(1/2).

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.l
ScalarVariable.description: Valve leakage, l=Kv(y=0)/Kv(y=1)

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.m_flow_nominal
ScalarVariable.description: Nominal mass flow rate

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.m_flow_nominal_pos
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute value of nominal flow rate

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.m_flow_small
ScalarVariable.description: Small mass flow rate for regularization of zero flow

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.m_flow_turbulent
ScalarVariable.description: Turbulent flow if |m_flow| >= m_flow_turbulent

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.rhoStd
ScalarVariable.description: Inlet density for which valve coefficients are defined

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.riseTime
ScalarVariable.description: Rise time of the filter (time to reach 99.6 % of an opening step)

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.sta_default.T
ScalarVariable.description: Temperature of medium

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.sta_default.p
ScalarVariable.description: Absolute pressure of medium

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.y_start
ScalarVariable.description: Initial position of actuator

ScalarVariable.name: y.duration
ScalarVariable.description: Duration of ramp (= 0.0 gives a Step)

ScalarVariable.name: y.height
ScalarVariable.description: Height of ramps

ScalarVariable.name: y.offset
ScalarVariable.description: Offset of output signal y

ScalarVariable.name: y.startTime
ScalarVariable.description: Output y = offset for time < startTime

ScalarVariable.name: sin.h_internal
ScalarVariable.description: Internal connector for enthalpy

ScalarVariable.name: sin.ports[1].m_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Mass flow rate from the connection point into the component

ScalarVariable.name: sin.ports[1].p
ScalarVariable.description: Thermodynamic pressure in the connection point

ScalarVariable.name: sou.h_internal
ScalarVariable.description: Internal connector for enthalpy

ScalarVariable.name: sou.ports[1].m_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Mass flow rate from the connection point into the component

ScalarVariable.name: sou.ports[1].p
ScalarVariable.description: Thermodynamic pressure in the connection point

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.kVal
ScalarVariable.description: Flow coefficient of valve, k=m_flow/sqrt(dp), with unit=(kg.m)^(1/2).

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.port_a.h_outflow
ScalarVariable.description: Specific thermodynamic enthalpy close to the connection point if m_flow < 0

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.port_a.m_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Mass flow rate from the connection point into the component

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.port_a.p
ScalarVariable.description: Thermodynamic pressure in the connection point

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.port_b.h_outflow
ScalarVariable.description: Specific thermodynamic enthalpy close to the connection point if m_flow < 0

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.port_b.m_flow
ScalarVariable.description: Mass flow rate from the connection point into the component

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.port_b.p
ScalarVariable.description: Thermodynamic pressure in the connection point

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.y
ScalarVariable.description: Actuator position (0: closed, 1: open)

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.y_actual
ScalarVariable.description: Actual actuator position

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.y_internal
ScalarVariable.description: Output connector for internal use (= y_actual if not casePreInd)

ScalarVariable.name: sin.flowDirection
ScalarVariable.description: Allowed flow direction

ScalarVariable.name: sin.nPorts
ScalarVariable.description: Number of ports

ScalarVariable.name: sou.flowDirection
ScalarVariable.description: Allowed flow direction

ScalarVariable.name: sou.nPorts
ScalarVariable.description: Number of ports

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.CvData
ScalarVariable.description: Selection of flow coefficient

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.init
ScalarVariable.description: Type of initialization (no init/steady state/initial state/initial output)

ScalarVariable.name: sin.use_C_in
ScalarVariable.description: Get the trace substances from the input connector

ScalarVariable.name: sin.use_T_in
ScalarVariable.description: Get the temperature from the input connector

ScalarVariable.name: sin.use_X_in
ScalarVariable.description: Get the composition (all fractions) from the input connector

ScalarVariable.name: sin.use_Xi_in
ScalarVariable.description: Get the composition (independent fractions) from the input connector

ScalarVariable.name: sin.use_p_in
ScalarVariable.description: Get the pressure from the input connector

ScalarVariable.name: sin.verifyInputs
ScalarVariable.description: Set to true to stop the simulation with an error if the medium temperature is outside its allowable range

ScalarVariable.name: sou.use_C_in
ScalarVariable.description: Get the trace substances from the input connector

ScalarVariable.name: sou.use_T_in
ScalarVariable.description: Get the temperature from the input connector

ScalarVariable.name: sou.use_X_in
ScalarVariable.description: Get the composition (all fractions) from the input connector

ScalarVariable.name: sou.use_Xi_in
ScalarVariable.description: Get the composition (independent fractions) from the input connector

ScalarVariable.name: sou.use_p_in
ScalarVariable.description: Get the pressure from the input connector

ScalarVariable.name: sou.verifyInputs
ScalarVariable.description: Set to true to stop the simulation with an error if the medium temperature is outside its allowable range

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.allowFlowReversal
ScalarVariable.description: = false to simplify equations, assuming, but not enforcing, no flow reversal

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.casePreInd
ScalarVariable.description: In case of PressureIndependent the model I/O is modified

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.from_dp
ScalarVariable.description: = true, use m_flow = f(dp) else dp = f(m_flow)

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.linearized
ScalarVariable.description: = true, use linear relation between m_flow and dp for any flow rate

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.show_T
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if actual temperature at port is computed

ScalarVariable.name: valLin.use_inputFilter
ScalarVariable.description: = true, if opening is filtered with a 2nd order CriticalDamping filter
